hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT ('code:' || a.CODE || '|value:' || a.NAME || '|type:' || a.TYPEOFAREA) SEARCH_RESULT FROM LOANCLAIM_AREA a WHERE a.SEARCH_POSTFIX LIKE (LOWER(:q) || '%') AND (a.REGION = :region) AND (:typeofarea IS NULL OR :typeofarea = '' OR a.TYPEOFAREA = :typeofarea)

SELECT ('code:' || a.CODE || '|value:' || a.NAME || '|type:' || a.TYPEOFCITY) SEARCH_RESULT FROM LOANCLAIM_CITY a WHERE a.SEARCH_POSTFIX LIKE (LOWER(:q) || '%') AND (a.REGION = :region) AND (:areaIsNull IS NULL OR a.AREA in (:area)) AND (:typeofcity IS NULL OR a.TYPEOFCITY = :typeofcity)

SELECT ('code:' || a.CODE || '|value:' || a.NAME || '|type:' || a.TYPEOFLOCALITY) SEARCH_RESULT FROM LOANCLAIM_SETTLEMENT a WHERE a.SEARCH_POSTFIX LIKE (LOWER(:q) || '%') AND (a.REGION = :region) AND (:areaIsNull IS NULL OR a.AREA in (:area)) AND (:cityIsNull IS NULL OR a.CITY in (:city)) AND (:typeoflocality IS NULL OR a.TYPEOFLOCALITY = :typeoflocality)

SELECT ('code:' || a.CODE || '|value:' || a.NAME || '|type:' || a.TYPEOFSTREET) SEARCH_RESULT FROM LOANCLAIM_STREET a WHERE a.SEARCH_POSTFIX LIKE (LOWER(:q) || '%') AND (a.REGION = :region) AND (:areaIsNull IS NULL OR a.AREA in (:area)) AND (:cityIsNull IS NULL OR a.CITY in (:city)) AND (:settlementIsNull IS NULL OR a.SETTLEMENT in (:settlement)) AND (:typeofstreet IS NULL OR a.TYPEOFSTREET = :typeofstreet)
